com.smoothcsv.core.macro.api

Class CsvProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smoothcsv.core.macro.apiimpl.APIBase
      • com.smoothcsv.core.macro.api.CsvProperties

  • public class CsvProperties
extends com.smoothcsv.core.macro.apiimpl.APIBase
    A class representing CSV properties such as delimiter, quote, and so on.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String AUTO 
      static java.lang.String CR

      static java.lang.String LF 
      static int NO_QUOTE
      Suppresses all quoting.
      static int QUOTES_ALL
      Quotes all values.
      static int QUOTES_IF_NECESSARY
      Quotes only when the value contains delimiter, quote, or escape.

      • getEscape

        public java.lang.String getEscape()
        Returns the character to escape quote characters. If this character equals '\0', quote characters must be represented by a pair of quote characters.
        Returns:
        the character to escape quote characters

      • setEscape

        public void setEscape(java.lang.String escape)
        Sets the character to escape quote characters. If this character equals '\0', quote characters must be represented by a pair of quote characters.
        Parameters:
        escape - the character to escape quote characters

      • getCharset

        public java.lang.String getCharset()
        Returns the charset that is used for saving file.
        Returns:
        the charset

      • setCharset

        public void setCharset(java.lang.String charset)
        Sets the charset that is used for saving file.
        Parameters:
        charset - the charset to set

      • setHasBOM

        public void setHasBOM(boolean hasBOM)
        Sets if the BOM (Byte Order Mark) will be inserted. If hasBOM is true and a UTF codec is used, the BOM (Byte Order Mark) will be inserted before any data has been written to the file.
        Parameters:
        hasBOM - true if the BOM (Byte Order Mark) will be inserted

      • hasBOM

        public boolean hasBOM()
        Returns if the BOM (Byte Order Mark) will be inserted. If hasBOM is true and a UTF codec is used, the BOM (Byte Order Mark) will be inserted before any data has been written to the file.
        Returns:
        true if the BOM (Byte Order Mark) will be inserted

      • getNewlineCharacter

        public java.lang.String getNewlineCharacter()
        Returns the newline character that is used for saving file.
        Returns:
        the newline character

      • setNewlineCharacter

        public void setNewlineCharacter(java.lang.String newlineCharacter)
        Sets the newline character that is used for saving file.
        Parameters:
        newlineCharacter - the newline character to set

      • getQuoteOption

        public int getQuoteOption()
        Returns the rule which indicates how to apply quote to a value. The value is either of the below.
        • NO_QUOTE
        • QUOTES_ALL
        • QUOTES_IF_NECESSARY
        Returns:
        the quoteOption

      • setQuoteOption

        public void setQuoteOption(int quoteOption)
        Sets the rule which indicates how to apply quote to a value. The value must be either of the below.
        • NO_QUOTE
        • QUOTES_ALL
        • QUOTES_IF_NECESSARY
        Parameters:
        quoteOption - the quoteOption to set
